Homepage.title: LinID Identity Manager
Homepage.intro: LinID Identity Manager is an open source Identity and Access Management (IAM) solution. This project aims to provide a secure, extensible, and standards-compliant platform to manage users, their rights, and their access within organizations.
Homepage.opensource: Open source project developed and maintained by LINAGORA.
Homepage.license: This project is released under the GNU Affero General Public License v3 (AGPLv3), ensuring that it remains free and open source for everyone.
Homepage.links:
• Source code available on GitHub
  • If you find a bug or an issue, please report it here.
